val:
Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience specializing in JS and primarily building projects in React and Node. Co-creator of formaBull, a next gen developer tool for form creation. Contributor to the open-source community and crypto enthusiast. Presenter on Testing Frameworks at SingleSprout Speaker Series 2021. In my spare time I`m learning Next/Gatsby/Go as wel

⚡ Love flying drones and traveling with my loved ones ❤️`
